portfolioList.title: IMS - Inventory management system
portfolioList.description: Web application design to simplify the process of stock management for small companies. This project aims to create an application that merges the need for rigourus stock management practices and a user-friendly experience.

Frontend: React, Typescript, Tailwind, Sass, React-Hook-Form, RecaptchaV3
Backend: NodeJs, Typescript, PostgreSQL, PrismaJs, ExpressJs, Axios, Firebase storage, Firebase Auth

portfolioList.title: Weather tracker
portfolioList.description: Web application design to use the NASA API to report weather event to its user.The weather events tacked by the app are fire events, active volcanos, and tropical storms.The app is fully responsive accross the most popular screen sizes.

Frontend: React, Typescript, Tailwind, Sass, Google Map

portfolioList.title: My portfolio
portfolioList.description: Website to showcase my web development skills.
